entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:41 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 5:31 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: ENE 48 km/h gust 61 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain or freezing rain late this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches developing late this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 20 this evening then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:18 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the morning with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:18 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:18 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
